title: Please explain
body:
"main" account - has ended the season in bronze 3 after 420ish games and a 51% w/l ratio. this account NEVER was below 50% w/l. at certain times it was 60% yet i could never break through to silver. somehow, with a constant 51 or more w/l it has ended up exactly where it started at the start of the season. note: has gained more lp for a win than lost the entire time which makes this even more confusing.

"smurf" account - placed in bronze 4 and has ended the season in silver 5 after 60ish games with a 41% w/l (wtf). this account NEVER was above 50% w/l yet it still managed to break into silver. note: the lp gain/loss was practically the same as my "main".

Please explain the logic in this system.

replies.body:
provisional rank you with Gold and Silvers to try situate you in the right Rank, It happened on my Smurf with >80 Wins on norms with 6 Wins and 4 Losses (Has to do with the wins too) but I got straight S IV. 

If you keep playing more and losing quite frequently then your MMR Drops and your LP per Win Drops too which makes it harder to climb,

 I guess it also has to do with the champions you pick, W/L on that Champ, What score you get on the champs, K/D/A, CS etc.. Thats my basic understanding but i dunno what else to say man :/ @Riot any info would be appreciated

> If you keep playing more and losing quite frequently then your MMR Drops and your LP per Win Drops too which makes it harder to climb,
> 
>  I guess it also has to do with the champions you pick, W/L on that Champ, What score you get on the champs, K/D/A, CS etc.. Thats my basic understanding but i dunno what else to say man :/ @Riot any info would be appreciated

Ive read the post and i responded now its time for you to read, DEPENDING ON WHAT CHAMPION YOU PLAY,CS,KDR, ETC WILL CONTRIBUTE TO YOUR MMR / SCORE 

(Btw no need to be a salty jackass) This is Boards not Riot Support if you really wanna know 100% go ahead and email Riot

this post is NOT about MMR and/or how it works.

2ndly that isn't even how MMR works (unless changes have been made that im unaware of. if they finally added personal contribution in a game as weighting for mmr then good because ive been asking for that for years). from what i understand MMR is based solely on W/L. BUT THIS IS IRRELEVANT TO THE SITUATION IM PRESENTING.

The POINT of this post is to show that the SAME PERSON is somehow "good enough" to climb on 1 account but "not good enough" to climb on another. BUT the astounding thing is the DIFFERENCE between W/L between the 2 accounts and how the one with a NEGATIVE W/L during the ENTIRE season was able to climb TIERS yet the account with a 100% of the season POSITIVE W/L was unable to climb. Why? It comes down to very specific games you win/loss IE PROMOS and the timing of streaks and a lot of the time these games are decided by factors out of your control (just like potentially any game). 

THEY ARE BOTH ESSENTIALLY SILVER BECAUSE OF THE MMR THAT YOU KEEP BRINGING UP (or at least for the majority of the season this was the case) BUT ONLY 1 HAS A SILVER GRAPHIC. Where's the logic in that?

basically this illustrates that people, in a lot of cases, ARE NOT where they belong. There's plenty of people "stuck" in a certain tier and there's plenty of people in a tier they shouldn't be in.

how do you explain 1 account climbing from b4 to s1 after 60 games with a 41% w/l yet the other account 60 games into the season with a 55% w/l could not? shouldn't it be the other way around?

If you don't see the problem with this system then i don't understand what else to say.

Since you're salty and just complain when i just gave my understanding you can speak to Riot, I think you're the one that doesn't understand it doesnt matter if you have 100- 80 Losses.. Again: THIS IS BOARDS if you wanna be a Sour Pussy keep complaining and Have fun in Silver.....

Edit: if you have a problem with the system create your own game and try support 63 million players every month and see how easy it is

your understanding is wrong though. it is soley based on wins/losses. that is literally the only thing that matter in their system.

besides, even if your understanding was true are you claiming that my stats on my silver account are somehow way better than my bronze account? it's the same person playing. are you also suggesting that my stats were so good to negate a 41% win/loss and still climb?

you talk about the amount of games played but you're ignoring the fact that im comparing their win/loss with the same amount of games played. it was a huge difference yet the one with a much worse record climbed to silver from bronze and the one with a much better record didn't. doesn't really make much sense does it, regardless of what your understanding of mmr and rank is. 

the fact that my post was removed "for being a jerk" by riot but they can't respond to my question says a lot.

look at the debacle with the new queue and how they fucked peoples ranks and matchmaking. stop acting like its unreasonable to suggest there were problems with it before.
If you belong in a higher tier you will get there. Looks like you belong in bronze right now... Happy to duo with you though, if you are chill and not toxic ;)
i feel like you didn't actually read anything
That is weird, haha. 51% with 420 wins and still Bronze. I'm guessing a shyteload of failed promos?
